Main.content: I must tell you what's really going on here.
This island. These tasks. It's just an experiment.
Do you believe that this islander represents you as a whole?
That weapon you used, is it not an extension of you?
If not then what about your arms that hold that weapon?
If the arm is separated from the body, then does that make two of "you"?
You would say it's no longer part of you.
So imagine losing more and more body parts
At what point can we stop before we reach the true "you"?
Think about it. I'll be back soon.
